h1: Details of the person or company we need to pay

fullName.label: Full name
fullName.hint: This can be the name of a person or company.

errors.required: Enter the full name of the person or company we need to pay.

emailAddress.label: Email address
emailAddress.hint: We'll only use this to let them know we've paid them.

errors.invalid: Email addresses can include letters a to z, numbers and some special characters. It must contain @. Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com
errors.required: Enter an email address for the person or company we need to pay.
